entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 04 January 2023
